name: Cyber Rush Winter Demo
description:
A little Platformer game I made in about a week during Christmas Break after finding and repurposing an older project of mine that I told I would one day release but never got around to it. Well here it is in all of its glory, a short, 6 level demo that will hopefully be fun (and rage-inducing)!
Music from Will You Snail OST by Jonas Tyroller - #17 Winter Mode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0lavCHDYnss
